Welcome!

Welcome to my new tech blog! This is the first post on a journey to share knowledge about web development, programming, and technology.

What is This Blog Built With?

This blog is built with modern web technologies that prioritize performance and developer experience:

Astro

Astro is a modern static site generator that delivers lightning-fast websites. It uses the Islands Architecture pattern, which means interactive components (like the dark mode toggle) only load JavaScript where needed. Everything else is just static HTML and CSS.

Svelte & shadcn-svelte

For interactive components, Iâ€™m using Svelte with shadcn-svelte, which provides beautiful, accessible UI components. These components use the latest Svelte 5 features including runes for reactivity.

TypeScript & esbuild

All code is written in TypeScript for type safety, and Astro uses esbuild (written in Go) under the hood for ultra-fast compilation. This means:

  • TypeScript compilation is 10-100x faster than traditional tsc
  • Hot reload takes less than 100ms
  • Full builds complete in under 5 seconds

Tailwind CSS

Styling is handled by Tailwind CSS, a utility-first CSS framework that makes it easy to build responsive, beautiful designs quickly.

Features

This blog includes several modern features:

Code Syntax Highlighting

Code blocks are highlighted using Shiki with support for 11+ programming languages:

function greet(name: string): string {
  return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}

console.log(greet("World"));
def greet(name: str) -> str:
    return f"Hello, {name}!"

print(greet("World"))

Dark Mode

Try clicking the sun/moon icon in the header! The theme preference is saved in localStorage and respects your system preferences.

Responsive Design

The site is fully responsive and works great on mobile, tablet, and desktop screens.

SEO Optimized

Every page includes:

  • Proper meta tags
  • Open Graph tags for social media
  • Sitemap generation
  • RSS feed
